bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
The current devel version is 1.3.0, as marked in meson.build and debian/changelog. However packaging/nnstreamer.spec is not updated. Make all version numbers consistent.
1. meson.build 2. .spec #2040 @anyj0527 3. debian 4. android jni

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2036>#2036</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
I just checked 1) meson.build, 3) debian/changelog, and 4) jni/nnstreamer.mk.
